solution_line_template: A total of {available_boxes} x {muffins_per_box} = <<{available_boxes}*{muffins_per_box}={muffins_packed_in_available_boxes}>>{muffins_packed_in_available_boxes} muffins will be packed in {available_boxes} boxes.
So {total_muffins} - {muffins_packed_in_available_boxes} = <<{total_muffins}-{muffins_packed_in_available_boxes}={remaining_muffins}>>{remaining_muffins} muffins still need to be packed in the boxes.
Thus, {remaining_muffins}/{muffins_per_box} = <<{remaining_muffins}/{muffins_per_box}={boxes_still_needed}>>{boxes_still_needed} boxes are still needed to pack all those {remaining_muffins} muffins.
